name: Always On by DirectTV
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src https://localhost:3000 wss://localhost:3000 http://skeletor.cloudster.tv https://sheetsu.com http://fonts.gstatic.com; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; font-src http://code.ionicframework.com http://fonts.gstatic.com 'self' data:; frame-src http://www.chrisjacobs.com 'src' data:; img-src https://dtvimages.hs.llnwd.net 'self' data:;
